/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the cityscape. The street, lined with buildings on both sides, stretches out into the distance, creating a sense of depth and perspective. Cars and buses are scattered along the road, hinting at the city's vibrant life. The sky above is a clear blue, adding a serene contrast to the urban scene below. In the background, trees can be seen, their green foliage providing a touch of nature amidst the concrete jungle. The image is taken from a low angle, which enhances the grandeur of the buildings and the vastness of the sky.
